disallowIdentifierNamesWithMessages: str.toLowerCase() throws an exception if str is not a string, use lowerCase(str) instead
str.toUpperCase() throws an exception if str is not a string, use upperCase(str) instead
parseFloat(n) has unexpected behavior, use float(n) instead
parseInt(n) has unexpected behavior, use int(n) instead
num.toFixed(n) throws an exception if num is not a number, use fixed(num,n) instead
